import React from "react"; import './PcCard.css' const PcCard = ({ charName, playerName, concept, image, attributes }) => { const showAttributeEmojis = (att, emoji) => { let display = '' for (let i = 0; i < att; i++) { display += emoji } return display } const displayHealthBar = (att) => { let red = '' let yellow = '' let green = '' for (let i = 0; i < att; i++) { red += 'üü•' yellow += 'üü®' green += 'üü©' } return red + yellow + green } return(

{charName}

{image}

{concept}

played by: {playerName}

Attributes
Brawn:
{showAttributeEmojis(attributes.brawn, 'üí™')}
Agility:
{showAttributeEmojis(attributes.agility, 'üëü')}
Smarts:
{showAttributeEmojis(attributes.intellegence, 'üß†')}
Wit:
{showAttributeEmojis(attributes.wit, '‚ö°Ô∏è')}
Charm:
{showAttributeEmojis(attributes.charm, '‚ú®')}
Presence:
{showAttributeEmojis(attributes.presence, 'üë§')}
Vitals
Status: Healthy
üü•üü•üü•üü•üüßüüßüüßüüßüü©üü©üü©üü©
‚ö†Ô∏è
{/*
Initiative determines your turn order in battle. Your Presence and Agility on the battlefield
*/}
üëü
{/*
Dodge lets you avoid damage.
*/}
‚è©
{/*

*/}
‚ô•Ô∏è
{/*
On flipping the Queen of Hearts, Crit gives you successes equal to your Charm stat.
*/}
üö´
{/*
When Jokers and Anti-Jokers meet, they obliterate each other. Use wisely to avoid the chaotic effects of flipping a Joker.
*/}
) } export default PcCard
